title: Beginning silk screening on fabric (TEFC)
creator_credit: Open College of Further Education (S. Aust.), South Australian Film Corporation and Brenton Holmes
brief_description: This program demonstrates the basic procedures for silk-screening on to fabric using paper stencils. Building a frame, attaching the silk, preparing stencils and making a two-colour print are shown
creator_credit_for_label: Open College of Further Education (S. Aust.), South Australian Film Corporation and Brenton Holmes
